text:
Hi!
Does anyone here know if using server-side cookies is totally legal? In general and from a GDPR point of view?

Example: set the HS tracking to server-side instead of local? (making it active for 13 months instead of browser cleaning it because of ITP 2.3 etc (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/reports/what-cookies-does-HubSpot-set-in-a-visitor-s-browser>) )
not sure of legality, but how would you accomplish this?

Anyone else having issues with the new template migration tool for moving assets between portals? I keep getting the following:

`Error: File example.template.json in folder example.template.json contains an external dependency that is not copied over.`

I'm guessing the dependency in this case is a form, but now it's causing the whole transfer process to fail
This is preventing us from migrating any of our templates.
Hey <@U26BLKGE4> I can look into this for you - can you DM me the portal ID and the path of the asset(s) you're trying to copy? Thanks!
Is anyone having issues with connecting a domain? I have already added a domain and set it ready for publishing. But now when i go to finish it, I get this...
And when I try to reconnect, I get errors
QQ - I have a page I want to protect with a password. Can I parse the form post data to verify they entered a password before rendering the page?
